title: Ayurvedic Anti-Aging Capsule (Rasayana Blend)
excerpt: A practitioner-formulated Rasayana capsule blend featuring Brahmi, Ashwagandha, and Amalaki to support vitality, cognition, and skin health.
content:
## What Is This Rasayana Capsule?
A rejuvenative herbal supplement formulated with standardized extracts of Brahmi, Ashwagandha, and Amalaki—three of Ayurveda's most important Rasayana herbs.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Rasayanas nurture ojas (vital essence), support memory, promote cellular regeneration, and offer gentle anti-aging support.

### Key Benefits (Supportive)
- Supports cognitive health and focus.
- Helps maintain energy and resilience.
- Promotes skin vitality and antioxidant support.

## Ingredients
- Standardized Brahmi extract
- Standardized Ashwagandha extract
- Amalaki extract
- Additional supportive herbs per formulation

## Usage Instructions
- Use **strictly as per label** or practitioner guidance.

## Packaging
- Eco-friendly bottle with clinical-style information.

## Safety & Consultation
- Consult doctor if pregnant, breastfeeding, on mental health medications, or with chronic conditions.

## Why Choose This Formula?
Professionally formulated, clearly standardized, and grounded in Ayurvedic rejuvenation tradition.
